category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 20 (Reasons for exclusion from general meeting resolution)
contents: Article 20 (Reasons for exclusion from general meeting resolution) The chairman or delegates may not participate in the resolution when any of the following applies: 1. When deciding on matters concerning themselves in the election or dismissal of officers, 2. Money. When there is a conflict between your interests and the sports association's interests in matters involving the giving and receiving of property.
